changeSet.sql: UPDATE ENTITY e JOIN ( SELECT e1.id, concat(e1.name, ' ', group_concat(COALESCE(ea1.value_string, ea1.value_number, ea1.value_boolean, ref1.name) separator ' ')) AS all_attribute_values FROM ENTITY e1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTITY_ATTRIBUTE ea1 ON e1.id = ea1.owner_id and ea1.list_index is null LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTITY ref1 ON ea1.value_entity_ref = ref1.id GROUP BY e1.id ) ea ON ea.id = e.id SET e.all_attribute_values = lower(ea.all_attribute_values) WHERE e.all_attribute_values is NULL
